attributes.action: ONLY ABOUT UK OR GB CITIZENSHIP MATTER
attributes.additional_details:
DEAR MR.PRIME MINISTER OF OUR UK OR GB AND DEPUTY PRIME MINISTER:MY PERSONAL WERE COVERING E-PETITION HAVING DETAILS IN FOLLOWING FILES IN WHICH HAS BEEN LISTED IN BELOWS ARE
ONE IS OUR UK OR GB FCO REF:BCN/13264/1979 TO MY LATE FATHER WHO ARE CHAN SUEN WENG VIA MR.I.A.BARRAS.
TWO IS OUR UK OR GB UKPA NOWADAY ARE IPS REF:UKP/3438/1990 ALSO MY LATE FATHER SHOWED IN ABOVE ONLY.
THREE IS OUR UK OR GB HOME OFFICE FAMILY APPLICATION UNIT REF:C-323151 TO MY WHOLE FAMILY INCLUDED MY LATE FATHER WHO ARE CHAN SUEN WENG AND MY LATE MOTHER WHO ARE SAM HAU FONG WITH ME ARE AN ONLY MALE SON FROM THEM.
YOUR SINCERELY,
FROM:CHAN YIU BING FRDRK.
DATED AT:06/01/2012.
